definition: The term "pingelig" refers to a characteristic or behavior of being excessively meticulous, nitpicky, or overly particular about small details. It is often used to describe someone who has a strong inclination towards perfectionism or who pays great attention to minor flaws or errors. This word is commonly employed when discussing individuals who are highly precise, demanding, or fussy about certain matters.

examples.german: Sie ist sehr pingelig, wenn es um Sauberkeit geht.
examples.english: She is very fussy when it comes to cleanliness.

examples.german: Er ist pingelig, wenn es um Grammatikfehler geht.
examples.english: He is picky when it comes to grammar mistakes.

examples.german: Meine Mutter ist pingelig, wenn es um das Arrangement der Möbel geht.
examples.english: My mother is meticulous when it comes to arranging the furniture.

examples.german: Der Chef ist pingelig, wenn es um Pünktlichkeit geht.
examples.english: The boss is particular when it comes to punctuality.

examples.german: Sie ist pingelig, wenn es um die Auswahl der Zutaten geht.
examples.english: She is finicky when it comes to selecting the ingredients.
